content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I have not received any new commands or developments since the previous summary. However, I received a command to read a file named "river_simulation_output_2023-05-07.txt". The command "read_file" was executed on my computer, and it returned information about the river\'s flow speed. Additionally, a command was received to browse a website about the concept of time in simulations.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The concept of time in simulations is not mentioned in the text. The text primarily covers the history and measurement of time in physics, including its role in theories such as relativity and quantum mechanics, as well as its use in timekeeping devices and its study in other fields such as philosophy and religion. \n \n Links: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_in_physics#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_step", "question": "What is a time step in simulations?"}}}'}]
"""
